sourcesContent:
Search for Flights
For
Passengers
{{flight}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-flights-search', templateUrl: './flights-search.component.html', styleUrls: ['./flights-search.component.css'] }) export class FlightsSearchComponent { // searchResults: any[] = [ // "American Airlines(USA)", // "Delta Airlines(USA)", // "United Airlines(USA)", // "Emirates(UAE)", // "Lufthansa(GER)", // "British Airways(UK)", // ] searchResult: FlightsRm[] = [ { airline: "American Airlines(USA)", } ] constructor() {} ngOnInit() { this.searchResults } } export interface FlightsRm { airline: string; arrival: TimePlaceRM; // arrive is bound to place and time departure: TimePlaceRM; price: string; numberOfSeatsAvailable: } export interface TimePlaceRM { // both values come in as strings place: string; time: string; }
